dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Hello, what brings you to this village?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I'm on a quest to defeat the dark sorcerer who has been terrorizing our lands.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: What makes you think I can help you?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Rumors say that you possess great magical abilities and are skilled in combat.
